Test Name: Heavy Metal/Creatinine Ratio, with Reflex, Random, Urine
Purpose: To measure heavy metal concentrations and their ratio to creatinine in urine for assessing exposure and aiding patient diagnosis and treatment.
Container: Clean, dry, leak-proof, properly labeled urine container
Equipment: Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS), analytical balance, centrifuge, refrigerator, freezer
